column5: Looking to buy just a replacement handle for the Abu Garcia Cardinal 100u ice fishing reel. Can anyone point me in the right direction please?  Thanks a bunch!

You can go here: Aikman’s Sporting Goods Repair 3010 Novar Rd., Mississauga, ON L5B 1S4 (905) 277-3595 Area Served: Ontario , or  Rocky’s Tackle Repair 10 Brammer Dr., Orilla, ON L3V 7T4 (705) 325-3526 Area Served: Ontario
